=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: After Earth [Blu-ray + DVD]
Review Date: 2014/01/13
Store: Jaden Smith  (Actor),     Will Smith  (Actor, Producer),     M. Shyamalan  (Director, Producer)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: Blu-ray
Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
Product Description: ['A crash landing leaves Kitai Raige (Jaden Smith) and his legendary father Cypher (Will Smith) stranded on Earth, 1,000 years after cataclysmic events forced humanity’s escape. With Cypher injured, Kitai must embark on a treacherous journey to signal for help. They must learn to work together and trust each other, if they want any chance of returning home.']
Average Rating: 4.4

Review Text: Great adventure flick. Rare to see a movie that handles issues between father and son and one that showcases both as really willing to try. Didn't make a joke out of Dad or of the son
Review Title: Surprisingly entertaining!!!

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Media Preferences:** Enjoys movies, particularly in the Sci-Fi and Adventure genres. Prefers formats such as Blu-ray and values high-quality viewing experiences.

- **Themes:** Appreciates narratives that explore complex family dynamics, especially father-son relationships. Shows a preference for stories that emphasize cooperation and trust.

- **Emotional Engagement:** Enjoys films that provide genuine emotional depth rather than surface-level comedy, suggesting a preference for meaningful storytelling over trivial humor.

- **Rating Behavior:** Tends to rate favorably, indicating a positive outlook on the films reviewed and likely a tendency to seek out enjoyable and engaging content. 

- **Production Quality:** Favors works by well-known actors and directors, indicating an inclination towards established talents in the film industry.

Overall, the user demonstrates a clear preference for thoughtfully constructed films that blend adventure with emotional resonance, coupled with high production standards.
